snippet.title: Amsterdam's Anne Frank House
snippet.description: At some point, it seems as though every child attending middle school or high school will read 'The Diary of Anne Frank.' Written by a young Jewish girl in Amsterdam in World War II, it is the story of her time with her...

snippet.title: Movie Review: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
snippet.description: Light on plot but heavy on cool stuff? Should hold kids' attention (and maybe make them long for a museum trip in real life.)

snippet.title: Field Trip to the Museum
snippet.description: Let's head out to the museum in search of inspirationâ€¦ Inspiration prompting your child to create their own museum.

snippet.title: Children's Museum Learning Adventures
snippet.description: Children's museums can be great places for kids to explore. Why not consider taking your kids to a few this summer? Here's a comprehensive list of children's museums around the United States and Canada.

snippet.title: Carnegie Museum of Art and Carnegie Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: These two world-class museums share the same building, and one ticket provides entry to both. Kids are entranced by the Hall of Architecture in the Museum of Art, which is filled with towering reproductions of majestic ...

snippet.title: Model Ships Museum and Trains Museum
snippet.description: Fans of boats and trains won't want to miss these two museums, housed in the same building. At the Trains Museum, train-loving kids will quickly become absorbed in the detailed diorama of collectable trains running on t...

snippet.title: Family Movie Night: Night at the Museum
snippet.description: Have an adventure at home with the Ben Stiller comedy 'Night at the Museum.'

snippet.title: Mom's Museum School
snippet.description: Plan your own "museum school" for kids, complete with books and activities.

snippet.title: Hands-On House Children's Museum
snippet.description: Don't touch that are words you will not hear at the Hands-On House Children's Museum. While it's obviously big on hands-on, interactive elements, the museum also has a...

snippet.title: Museum of Science and Industry
snippet.description: Chicago is known for its world-class museums, but this one -- the largest science museum in the Western Hemisphere -- truly stands apart: More than 35,000 artifacts are housed in 400,000...
